sentences.sContent: Such trends do not enthrall neutrals, many of whom would prefer to see free-scoring Barcelona win tomorrow.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such trends do not enthrall neutrals, many of whom would prefer to see free-scoring Barcelona win tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 这些趋势并没有迷惑住中立者，他们中的很多人更愿意火力十足的巴萨明天赢球。

remMethod.val: en(使) + thrall(奴隶) → 成为(爱的)奴隶 → 迷住

words.tran: 迷住；奴役；令人愉快（enthral的过去分词）
奴役；使…做奴隶；迷惑（等于enthrall）
